title.native: Ｓランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけど、猫と間違われてエルフ娘の騎士（ペット）として暮らしてます
title.romaji: S-Rank Monster no "Behemoth" Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Elf Musume no Pet to Shite Kurashitemasu
title.english: Beheneko: The Elf-Girl's Cat is Secretly an S-Ranked Monster!

description:
Nobody asked to be a cat!

After dying in a fight against the forces of evil, a knight is shocked to discover that instead of being reborn as a hero of humanity, he starts his new life as a behemoth-one of the most powerful monsters in the world! The only problem is that a baby behemoth looks an awful lot like...an adorable house cat?! Things grow even more confusing when a beautiful elf adventurer rescues him from the brink of death rather than finishing him off. This house-cat-slash-knight's baffling journey is just getting started...

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: I'm a "Behemoth," an S-Ranked Monster, but Mistaken for a Cat, I Live as an Elf Girl's Pet

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Zoophilia
tags.description: Features a character who has a sexual attraction for non-human animals.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Large Breasts
tags.description: Features a character with larger-than-average breasts.

tags.name: Dungeon
tags.description: Prominently features a dungeon environment.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Monster Girl
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who is part-monster.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Fairy
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a fairy.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Demons
tags.description: Prominently features malevolent otherworldly creatures.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: War
tags.description: Partly or completely set during wartime.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://x.com/pokapokaion) | [Website](https://www.jvcmusic.co.jp/flyingdog/pokapokaion/)

Unit Formed by [Nao Touyama](https://anilist.co/staff/106184/) and [Kiyono Yasuno](https://anilist.co/staff/107711/), who are active as voice actor and singer from flying DOG. They are members of Walküre and got along in a certain TV show they attended in 2017 and wished they wanted to sing together. It is officially launched in 2021.

Unit Concept is "Heal People's Heart and Deliver Vitamin / Energy for Tomorrow"
